title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cockroaches in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cockroaches in a dream. They are a type of flying insect. They are widespread in many places and grow from eggs. Many people see the cockroach as it is called in reality, but what is the meaning of seeing cockroaches in a dream? It certainly symbolizes many different meanings, as we will discover the interpretation. Seeing cockroaches in a dream. You can watch: Interpretation of dreams about eating fruitInterpretation of a dream about cockroaches in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says in his book on the interpretation of dreams that cockroaches sometimes indicate envy and the evil eye. If these cockroaches are killed in a dream, the envy stops and ceases. Their death indicates the end of the influence of the body. Whoever sees cockroaches in his dream, this dream interprets that there is a certain problem. You do not see yourself remaining silent about it without fixing it and dealing with it, and this problem often exists in the family. And whoever sees cockroaches and insects in general, the dream also indicates the presence of devils and jinn sometimes. If the dreamer is sick and finds cockroaches or cockroaches in the dream, then his illness is the result of an eye infection and envy. It is said that seeing cockroaches and harmful and rebellious insects in a dream indicates envy and malice. Or witchcraft whose owner seeks to harm you, and whoever sees in his dream that he killed cockroaches or Insects in the form of cockroaches, then envy goes away by God’s command. And whoever sees in his dream that a house of cockroaches is in front of him, then cockroaches come out of it in abundance and in abundance towards him, or into his house, or towards his wife, or towards the unknown, but in his environment the dreamer is exposed to magic. And one of the people conspires against him. And he prepares magic for him, or prepares for it, and whoever sees many cockroaches scattered in his house. This indicates that there is a problem in the house if he sees them inside the house, but if he sees a cockroach or two or more, then the dream appears to be a corrupt man. Seeing cockroaches of a very dark color or Black is a sign of the presence of demons. Or people who are jealous of him, and they often feel jealous of very close people, whether friends or family. Interpretation of a dream about killing cockroaches. Seeing killing cockroaches in a dream indicates that there is no change in the dreamer’s life. Seeing yourself killing cockroaches in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to get rid of One of his bad habits. Also, seeing cockroaches killed in a dream means getting rid of negative people in reality. Seeing yourself directly killing cockroaches in a dream indicates the dreamer’s ability to deal with life’s problems. As for using a spray to kill cockroaches, it shows thinking about facing life’s difficulties. Interpretation Dreaming of eating cockroachesSeeing a cockroach entering the mouth indicates that the dreamer is committing many crimes in reality. Seeing cockroaches in a dream indicates negative things in reality. Interpretation of a dream when seeing flying cockroachesSeeing flying cockroaches in a dream indicates the presence of some negatives in the dreamer’s life in reality. Interpretation Dreaming of white cockroaches in a dream: Seeing a white cockroach in a dream indicates betrayal of a certain person’s trust in reality to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about red cockroaches: If you see a red cockroach in a dream,

title: A detailed interpretation of eggplant in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of eggplant in a dream is the focus of our article today, as eggplant is considered one of the most delicious popular foods that many people want to eat. Through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will learn in detail the interpretation of a dream about eggplant in a dream for different situations. Interpretation of eggplant in a dream Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing eggplant in a dream The scholar Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams of black eggplant out of season, his dream indicates that he will hear bad news and face problems. If a person dreams that he is eating eggplant, this means that he is doing what God has allowed him to do. Seeing him eating fried eggplant indicates that the dreamer feels jealous and envious of those around him. Eating white eggplant in a dream indicates that there is joy and happiness on the way to The dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant according to Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi believes that one of the praiseworthy visions is the dream of catching eggplant, because it means that the dreamer has good morals and a good reputation. If one eats eggplant at the specified time in a dream, this indicates that he will be blessed with kindness and a lot of money. As for Whoever takes it at the wrong time, this is an indication that the visionary is suffering from problems and worries. A dream in which he gives eggplant to someone indicates that the dreamer feels jealous of this person. One of the unpleasant dreams about eggplant is seeing it boiled, because it is a sign that the dreamer will suffer from sorrows and worries in the future. His life. Whoever dreams of stuffed eggplant, his dream indicates that he will hear good news soon. If one dreams that he is frying eggplant, this means that he has a great status among others. Dreaming of large black eggplant in a dream indicates that changes will occur in the dreamer’s life, and they could be These changes are positive or negative. A dream about buying eggplant indicates that the dreamer is earning his money through legitimate means. One of the good visions is that you cook eggplant in a dream, as this means saving the dreamer from his worries and problems and a journey for those who search for them. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a dream about eggplant. Ibn Shaheen says that a dream about eggplant At the wrong time symbolizes that the dreamer will suffer from misfortunes and troubles. As for seeing eggplant at the right time in a dream, it expresses the great goodness that the dreamer will obtain. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating eggplant, this means that he will achieve the dreams he is looking for. It shows the person who harvests eggplant On an inappropriate date in a dream, his envy and hatred for others. If one sees that he is eating a white eggplant, his dream shows his good reputation to those around him. Interpretation of a single woman seeing eggplant in a dream. If a single woman dreams of white eggplant, her dream means that she will hear good news and that she has A lot of good things. A single woman eating fried or black eggplant in a dream indicates that she will face problems and difficulties in her life. Whoever sees in her dream that she is cooking eggplant, her dream shows her closeness to her relationship and her happiness in her life after this relationship. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman with eggplant. the

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about raw meat from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of seeing buying raw meat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about raw meat in a dream. Many great dream interpreters agreed that they are unwanted dreams because meat is one of the types of food that requires effort to digest, especially if the meat is raw. Interpretation of a dream about raw meat Raw meat in a dream indicates that there are many disasters and difficulties. Which the dreamer will face in the coming days, and he must seek refuge with God Almighty from the evil of this vision, which carries within it many negative connotations for the pioneer. All dream interpreters unanimously agree that seeing raw meat in a dream is an unpleasant vision, which indicates many difficulties that will surround him. It affects the dreamer in many aspects of life, especially when the dreamer cuts it himself in the vision. It was said that buying raw meat from its primary source, and there was a family member or relative of the dreamer in a critical condition, so the vision indicates the approaching death of the patient and his death in the near future, I swear. Glory be to Him, Most High, and He knows best. Whoever sees in his dream that he is eating raw meat in the company of his close friends, then his vision indicates that he is deepening people’s reputation and honor due to what they lack in terms of qualities and hadiths, and he should be careful. And his deeds and his return to God Almighty and repentance for his deeds. Interpretation of a dream about raw meat by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing raw meat in a dream as a group of misfortunes awaiting the dreamer in all aspects, and he must return to God and ask Him for the blessing of safety and salvation, as it is one of the ominous visions. She interpreted the vision A person eats raw meat in a dream with his friends, then this is an indication that the dreamer is acquiring prohibited money, and he and those of his friends who were with him participated in collecting it from an unreliable source. It was also said about seeing raw meat in a dream that whoever sees himself eating raw meat in a dream, this is a sign that he is afflicted with a fatal disease that has no cure, and he must take care of this matter, by God. He knows best. The dreamer’s invitation to his friends and relatives to eat raw lamb in a dream and prepare a big feast for him, is a sign of the approaching term. With the approval of the great dream interpreters, we ask God for safety. With us inside the online dream interpretation site from Google you will find everything you need. Interpretation of a dream about raw meat for women is not... Married women: An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she is cutting a large piece of raw meat into many small pieces, her vision indicates that her marriage will be delayed due to the number of pieces of meat she cut in the dream, and she may not get them. Married at all. Whoever sees in her dream that someone is giving her a gift of raw meat, the vision indicates that there are many problems and crises that this girl and this man will be exposed to, and this man will be the direct cause of these crises. They have to be careful. Seeing a close friend offering raw meat to one person in a dream means treachery and betrayal on the part of that friend, and cooking raw meat in a person’s dream is taking advantage of someone close to him with great love without reciprocating the same feeling. It is also said that raw meat in a dream Unmarried woman means

title: Interpretation of eating eggs in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of eating eggs in a dream in various cases that a fortuneteller can see. We present to you today eggs are one of the basic elements necessary for breakfast as well as for dinner. They are rich in proteins and many important nutrients for the body in addition to their delicious taste, which makes everyone prefer them. They are acceptable, but what about the interpretation of eating? Eggs in a dream. Does this vision differ depending on the way it is cooked? This is what we are asking. We will learn through today’s encyclopedia article, so follow us. Interpretation of eating eggs in a dream. Dream interpretation jurists have agreed that eating boiled eggs in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates the great goodness that the dreamer will reap in the dream. Reality, and that it is good news for the happiness and joy that he experiences in life. This is if the eggs are healthy and not spoiled. As for eating raw eggs in a dream, it does not bode well at all, as it is a sign of the many sins and sins committed by God, and he must beware and approach God Almighty. Perhaps this dream is a sign of obtaining forbidden money. Eating egg shells in a dream indicates gossip and gossip that the fortuneteller follows in life, which he must get rid of and seek forgiveness from Almighty God for his actions. Eating eggs without peeling them is a sign of marrying a rich woman who has a lot of money. Interpretation of eating eggs in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating eggs, then her dream is a sign that the dreams she has longed for will come true. It may be It is good to hear good news in the near future. If the eggs do not taste good or if they are rotten, this is a sign that they will face many problems that they cannot solve. Eating eggs in a married woman’s dreamIf a married woman finds herself in a dream eating boiled eggs, then Her dream is evidence of the happiness that she lives with her husband in reality. Perhaps this dream portends achieving what she wants, whether it is an abundant diet, or pregnancy soon. There are some cases in which seeing yourself eating eggs is not a sign of goodness, including eating eggs in their shell or Even the rotten ones, as it indicates the differences and difficulties that the viewer will face, God forbid. In some cases, her dream is a sign that she is wasting the money she obtains on useless or useless things. Interpretation of eating eggs in a dream for a pregnant womanIn the event that a pregnant woman is exposed to this The dream is a sign of the need for reassurance because she will enjoy an easy and simple birth, God willing. She will have a healthy, healthy baby who will kiss her eye. But if the eggs are rotten or have a shell, then this is an unpleasant vision that you should pay attention to. Interpretation of eating boiled eggs in a dream: The interpretation of seeing boiled eggs does not differ from fried eggs; Because both of them are at the level of maturity, so if the dreamer sees that he is eating eggs, whether fried or boiled, this is a sign that he will come. Able to fulfill all the desires you already have. As for E

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a complete bite in a dream, and what does it mean for an unmarried, married, or pregnant woman?

preview.html: Why dream that you are bitten in a dream? The bite is a cherry with teeth on the skin. Seeing yourself bitten in a dream has many indications and interpretations, which we will learn about through this article. The neck, where we provide you with a complete interpretation of a bite in a dream for a married woman and an adult, as well as evidence of a bite in a dream for a pregnant woman from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. . About the bite, you should follow the article. What is the dream of the bite of Imam al-Sadiq? The interpretation of seeing a girl being bitten in a dream by an unknown person is a sign that there is someone who wants her and wants a woman for him. A married woman who saw her husband biting her in a dream shows his intense love for her and his inability To give it up. Dreaming that a brother bites his brother is a good vision that indicates the existence of a strong relationship between them and family ties. Seeing bites in a dream generally indicates that a lot of good will happen to the dreamer and is a sign of goodness and happiness. See also: Why do you dream that you see a tablet And bite in a full dream. Ibn Sirin Why dream of biting a single woman? The interpretation of biting a woman in a dream is complete evidence of gossip and false statements against people, and he must repent and stay away from it. In addition, the elements of this vision may indicate his shortcomings in his relationship with someone close to him, whether they are friends or people. Biting a married woman in a dream Complete interpretation of a bite in a dream filled with a married woman and her husband had parts of her body – evidence of his great love for her in reality. Seeing how her children bite each other is a sign of kindness and goodness in this world and evidence of their high status. Seeing the consequences of a bite on a woman’s body in a dream Complete means that there are many lovers in her life for that woman. See also: Why dream of a full bite in a dream? A bite in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a lot of bites in a dream full of a pregnant woman is good news that her affairs will be easier and labor and childbirth will be successful. Also, seeing a woman in a dream biting Her unborn child is evidence of the birth of a child, which will be of great importance. Why dream of a bite on the neck? Seeing a bite on the neck of a person whom the dreamer does not love in a complete dream is excellent evidence that he will suffer from conspiracies, betrayal and troubles. In some books of interpreters it is talked about A bite on the neck is a sign of love and adoration, whether the bite is from a woman to a man or vice versa. A bite in a dream near the dreamer is good news and indicates love and affection between them, as it is a sign of kindness, support and success between them. See also: Why dream of seeing a kiss or a kiss in A complete dream. Why do you dream of being bitten on your cheek? The sight of a woman biting her cheek indicates that she may do many things that displease her Lord and adorn herself with unknown men. Biting the cheek in a dream indicates bad speech and unnatural behavior, as well as a bad character and relationship between the dreamer and people. Why do you dream? With a dead person biting a living person in a complete dream? Seeing the dead in a dream full of them biting the living suggests many interpretations related to inheritance, inheritance, and money.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of the number five in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Number five in a dream, the number five is one of the odd numbers mentioned twice in the Holy Quran and is considered one of the symbols of good luck in the world, and when we see it in a dream, its connotations may differ according to the category and category and derivatives of numbers such as five pounds or seeing the number 50 or 500 or five thousand, and in the lines of this article we will discuss the most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin and other senior jurists and scholars to explain the vision of the number five in a dream. Number five in a dream Scholars provide many different meanings for the interpretation of the number five in a dream, such as: Seeing an unmarried woman writing the number five in her sleep means that she will get a lot of money. Interpreting the dream of the number five indicates the dreamer's balance between life issues, whether at work or in social and emotional relationships and the desire to obey God. Some elderly people interpret seeing the number five in the parents' dream as indicating that their children have learned the five pillars of Islam. If a person sees the number five in his dream, he pays zakat from his money and gives charity to the needy. Number five in Ibn Sirin's dream What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing the number five in a dream? Ibn Sirin says that seeing the number five in a dream is A metaphor for the dreamer's commitment to performing the five daily prayers. Ibn Sirin, the restless musician, who sees the number five in his dream, portends the death of the problems and suffering that disturb his life, and the mood of sadness and misery is approaching relief. The number five in the dream of the rich is good news about an increase in money and influence, and in the dream of the poor it is evidence of relief from distress and well-being after distress. Seeing the number 5 in a dream means good luck for the visionary in this world. The number five in the dream of a single woman It is said that seeing the number one in a dream and repeating it more than once indicates her marriage after five months or five years. Seeing the number 5 written in a girl's dream indicates the balance of her emotions, the stability of her psychological and emotional state, and the calmness of her mind. The number 5 is one of the numbers that symbolize luck and happiness in the dreamer's dream. The number 500 in the dream of a single woman The number 500 in the dream of a single woman indicates that she enjoys her health, safety, and protection from illness and disease. The number 500 in a girl's dream indicates that she will obtain a large financial fortune that may come From the inheritance. Five pounds in a dream for a single woman. The scholars’ interpretations of seeing five kilograms in an unmarried woman’s dream have many commendable and promising connotations, such as: If an unmarried woman sees five kilograms in her dream, she will marry a wealthy man. Seeing a girl weighing five pounds of paper in a girl’s dream means that she has overcome her psychological struggles and gotten rid of negative energy and avoided its consequences later. The working visionary, if she finds five pounds in her dream, will get a promotion at work. The five green fairies in an unmarried woman’s dream are a sign of her good condition, religion, and distinction in high morals and good behavior among people. The number five in a dream for a married woman Seeing the number five in a married woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of twins in a dream in detail

preview.html: We present to you in detail the interpretation of twins in a dream. Dreams come to the minds and minds of people at night, at the time of sleep, to reveal the truth of what is happening in their subconscious mind and appears to them in the form of events that may be interconnected and successive, and carry between their aspects certain meanings and associations for the dreamer, and what may be emanating from his mind. The subconscious. Therefore, many people are interested in interpreting their dreams to find out what secret and deep meanings they hide. Dreams and helping their owners interpret them. Therefore, today we present to you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees twins in a dream from the encyclopedia website. Interpretation of twins in a dreamThe birth of twins is considered one of the happy things in life, which brings great happiness to the family and friends of the family, but what about its meaning in the dream, we will learn In detail in the following lines. Seeing twins in a dream for single people: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream, this means that she will give birth to twins. This is good news of joy and happiness coming to her to make her heart happy, God willing. It may also mean that this single girl is on her way to staying away from sins and disobedience and walking in the path of the satisfaction of God Almighty and His Messenger. But if an unmarried woman sees herself giving birth to twins, this is a warning that her current life is not satisfactory. God Almighty, so she must return to the path of guidance, re-examine herself and seek forgiveness to repent for what she has done. If an unmarried woman sees that she has given birth to twins, a girl and a boy, this is a sign of her readiness to get engaged and marry someone she loves and wants, and the engagement will actually take place. It will not continue and be nullified, and God is Most High and knows the unseen.Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married womanInterpretation of a married woman who sees male twins in her dream is a harbinger of distress and sadness in her life or that she will suffer from poverty and lack of money, and a member of her family may be harmed or hate her, and God knows best.While If a married woman sees twin girls, this is good news and an abundance of livelihood that she will obtain, or that a long-awaited wish or desire will come true. Also, seeing the same married woman giving birth to twin girls, a male and a female, indicates that she will live a happy and stable married life with her husband, But they will be surrounded by envious people who hate her happiness and try to discriminate. Between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream about giving birth to twins varies according to the gender of the children. He will face difficulties in the first years of his upbringing. But if a pregnant woman sees herself giving birth to twin daughters, this is a good omen that she will complete her birth in peace and happiness, and that she and her newborn will be fine, God willing. But if the pregnant woman sees herself giving birth to twins, this indicates that Her birth will be difficult and she will be exposed to some pain and difficulties after giving birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a man: A man seeing his wife giving birth to twins, male or female, indicates that abundance of sustenance and kindness will soon reach him, and he is likely to soon get a promotion at work. However, if a man sees his wife giving birth to twins, a male and a female, then this is good news of the arrival of sustenance

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a deer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream: Since deer are beautiful pets, when we hear someone describe a girl as beautiful, he describes her as a deer. It indicates multiple opportunities. You may also know a lion in a dream. In this article we will learn about some interpretations of seeing a deer in a dream, stressing that our site is not responsible when someone infers any interpretation, and we will mention it for any vision, because we always stress that the interpretation of visions cannot be achieved by specifying Interpretation of another vision similar to this vision, but one of the scholars who interpret dreams related to them must examine forensic science. Interpretation of the vision of a deer by Imam al-Sadiq. Imam al-Sadiq explained the deer he saw in his dreams as a dreamer who does not bear responsibility for himself, but when he saw him hunting a deer without fear, he was impressed. This is evidence of the strength of his personality. Above all, the fear of adventure and the absence of danger, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a deer Al-Osaimi Imam Al-Osaimi confirmed that a deer in a woman’s dream can indicate the health she enjoys, but if you see her running from a gazelle in a dream, this indicates that she missed many possible opportunities. She had to move to a higher level. Standard of living. When you see a merchant carrying a deer in a dream, this indicates benefiting from this trade and material interests. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing a deer in a dream is from The most important symbols of good luck for the dreamer - God willing - and God knows best. Also, if you dream of a deer in a dream while it is running, this indicates missed opportunities by the dreamer. In addition to seeing a deer dying in a dream, this could be a sign of false kisses. In addition, killing a deer in a dream is one of the most important signs of treachery and treachery among friends, and God knows best. Read also: Washing the deadSeeing a deer in a dream Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi says that the escape of a deer in a dream indicates that the dreamer has missed many valuable opportunities. Just like the dreamer who is trying Catching a deer in a dream, this indicates his bold personality and that he loves adventures, and God knows best. As for eating deer meat in a dream, this indicates the dreamer’s desire to break his habits and switch to a better life. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing a deer in a single woman’s dream indicates An unmarried girl who sees a deer in a dream indicates that this girl enjoys luck, honor, and purity. Whereas the deer in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the lover who will marry her, God willing, and the blood of a deer in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates money, and if a girl eats deer meat, this indicates On nutrition. And God knows best. Seeing a deer in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a deer in a dream indicates that she is a fortunate woman, God willing, and God knows best. A dead deer in a married woman’s dream indicates the search for stability and a feeling of loneliness. But if a married woman sees in a dream an eye

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a married woman by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a married woman: The white dress in a married woman’s dream has many connotations that bode well for its owner because it is a sign that she will become pregnant soon and that her married life will be stable and free of problems and sorrows, but if the dress is seen in a bad condition, this is a sign of evil and harm that will find her, and we will learn about it. All of these interpretations are detailed in the following article. Interpretation of a dream of a white dress for a married woman. The dream of a white dress for a married woman in a dream is interpreted as the stability that she lives with her husband and the great love that exists between them. A married woman’s dream of wearing a white dress in a dream is a good sign for her because it is a sign that she She will experience happiness and goodness in her life during this period. A married woman’s dream of wearing a white dress in a dream indicates that she will get rid of the crises and problems that she suffered from in the previous period, God willing. But if a married woman sees in her dream that white seduction is dirty and impure, this is a sign that she She is very jealous of her husband and mistreats him a lot, which will cause her many problems in the future. In general, seeing a white dress in a dream is a sign of the abundance of goodness and blessing that the dreamer enjoys. Interpretation of a dream of a white dress for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted the married woman Who saw the white dress in a dream as a sign of her stability and happiness in her life with her husband and family. Seeing a married woman in a dream in a white dress symbolizes that she will earn a lot of good and big money from projects that she started a while ago, and she will enjoy a luxurious life soon, God willing. Seeing a white dress in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. If a married woman sees a white wedding dress in her dream, this means that she will recover from any disease she has contracted, God willing. If a married woman sees in her dream that there is a red spot on the dress White in a dream, this is a sign of her fear and remorse for some things she did in the past that affected her life. Away. Interpretation of a dream about a white dress for a married pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a white dress symbolizes that she will get rid of the difficult period she went through during pregnancy and will give birth soon, God willing, and she and the fetus will be in good health. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream wearing a white dress and marrying her husband shows that she She loves her husband very much as he does, and does not stop supporting her and giving her full support during pregnancy. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream wearing a white dress is a sign that her birth will be easy and pain-free, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees a white dress in her dream, this is a sign that she She will overcome the problems and crises that afflicted her life during this period. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a white dress for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about wearing a white dress in a married woman’s dream: It is good news and a companion for its owner, because it is a sign of the death of anxiety and relief from anxiety and the very good things that come to fruition.

title: Interpretation of seeing henna on the feet of married and unmarried women with different interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing henna on the feet of married and unmarried women has different interpretations. Henna is one of the ancient Arab customs and traditions, and there are many countries that still maintain these customs until now, where henna is used to color the skin and hair in temporary colors as a kind of change. To see henna in Dreams have many promising and not-so-promising interpretations, but most of them do not harm the fortuneteller’s life in general. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing henna on the feet for married and single women with different interpretations. Interpretation of the dream of seeing henna on the hand in a dream for a married woman. Henna is a constant sign of goodness, happiness and pleasure. Therefore, this indicator does not exceed the dream range. The henna is black and the drawing technique and designs are beautiful. It was the best and the last. However, if a married woman sees henna on one side and not the other, or if the patterns are disorganized and overlapping, or the features are unclear, then this is not certain, and it may indicate some unhappiness or problem that she is suffering from. It is possible for us to meet. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna on my legs in a dream for a married woman. Henna is a sign of joy and happiness and is interpreted in a dream as good news about the coming goodness. If a married woman sees that her blood is dyed with henna, this is strong evidence that she will give birth soon, in the event that she is not pregnant yet. This dream also specifically indicates that her married life will be blessed with stability, understanding, love, happiness, and kindness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna in an unmarried woman’s hair. A dream in which an unmarried woman sees herself applying henna to her hair or having her hair filled with henna is interpreted as a sign of prestige, dominance and power. In the coming of goodness, blessing, and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing henna on the right hand in a dream. Since ancient times, it was customary for henna to be a symbol of happiness and joy, as girls used it for decoration at weddings and other occasions, and therefore seeing henna in a dream is generally interpreted as good news with permission. God. And whoever sees in a dream that his right hand has henna on it, this indicates that goodness is from God Almighty and that his life will improve for the better. For reference, this interpretation is generalized to everyone, whether the person who dreams is a man, a woman, a young man, or a girl. married. This dream may indicate a blessing in the provision of children and that their conditions will be better for an unmarried woman, that is, a man will propose to her. But if a person sees henna on his left hand, then we are not doing good here, because this dream interprets that the person will suffer losses and face problems and may reach harm. If a pregnant woman sees henna in her dream, this is a sign of her complexion and goodness, and that her birth will be easy, God willing, and that the newborn will be female. This vision can also be a sign of the arrival of a trip for someone close to you. For a person to be happy in a dream while he is
